sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 15 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Read through once, then summarize in your own words.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### What this is
Stress prepares the body for action. The same system can stay activated even when danger has passed.

### Why it matters
- Naming stress responses reduces self-blame.
- Short resets can calm the body.

### Try this
- Notice one body signal of stress.
- Use a 3-minute reset today.

### Common traps
- Pushing through without breaks.
- Judging yourself for feeling stressed.

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Check for understanding and reinforce one takeaway.
- Pair with a practical exercise when possible.
